ConfigurationGroup.title: Blog
ConfigurationGroup.description: Configuration Settings For The Blog Extension

EXTENSION_BLOG_ENABLED.title: Enable Blog
EXTENSION_BLOG_ENABLED.description: Enable Or Disable The Blog Extension

EXTENSION_BLOG_POST_PER_PAGE.title: Blog Post per Page
EXTENSION_BLOG_POST_PER_PAGE.description: Number of blog post per page

EXTENSION_BLOG_ENABLE_COMMENTS.title: Enable Blog Comments
EXTENSION_BLOG_ENABLE_COMMENTS.description: Enable Or Disable The Blog Comments

EXTENSION_BLOG_ENABLE_CAPTCHA.title: Enable Blog Captcha
EXTENSION_BLOG_ENABLE_CAPTCHA.description: Enable Or Disable The Blog Comments captcha

EXTENSION_BLOG_SHOW_ONLY_INFOBOXES.title: Show only blog infoboxes on the blog pages
EXTENSION_BLOG_SHOW_ONLY_INFOBOXES.description: If set to true, on the blog pages(categories, archives, posts) it will show only two infoboxes(categories and archives)

EXTENSION_BLOG_SHOW_INFOBOXES_ON_REST_SI.title: Show blog infoboxes on the rest of the site pages
EXTENSION_BLOG_SHOW_INFOBOXES_ON_REST_SI.description: If set to true, on the rest of the site it will show the infoboxes(categories and archives)

EXTENSION_BLOG_DEFAULT_CATEGORY.title: Blog default category
EXTENSION_BLOG_DEFAULT_CATEGORY.description: Blog default category. Will take the RSS name and description.

EXTENSION_BLOG_SHOW_RSS_ON_BAR.title: Show RSS Icon on browser URL Bar
EXTENSION_BLOG_SHOW_RSS_ON_BAR.description: Show RSS Icon on browser URL Bar
